lore: This creature is responsible for one of the most unpleasant landscapes in the country. Like Arachnalisks, Mites reach peaks of overpopulation once or twice a century. When the forests of Rodia are completely tangled in cobwebs, a disgusting sight that causes serious damage to ecosystems, it means it is time for the authorities to take measures. Its silk also allows it to survive in extreme environments and to immobilize its enemies.
menagerieDialog: (It's rolled into a ball, sleeping lazily.)
(It keeps nibbling at its teammates, who are most certainly growing tired of its shenanigans.)
(It's doing some kind of strange clicking thing with its mandibles. You're horrified, but you can't bring yourself to look away.)
(It's eating a bunch of tiny insects. Surely that's cannibalism, is it not?)
(It's unsuccessfully trying to burrow into the floor.)
name: Mite Webweaver
